VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: combat
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Combat psycasts are focused on getting right in the thick of things and fighting it out.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Combat psycasters are adept at using their abilities offensively to attack the enemy.
